info.name: Client Secret Rotation and Key Management

item.name: Add a client secret: bring your own secret

item.name: List client secrets for the specified app

request.description: Lists the secrets that are configured for the specified app. If the app's `token_endpoint_auth_method` doesn't use secrets, the API returns an empty response.

request.description: Use to locate the app `id` for the client app that you want to rotate client secrets for.
Use to locate the app `id` for the app that you want to rotate client secrets for.

Adds a new JWK to the specified clients JWKS.

Note: This API doesn't let you add a key if the existing key doesn't have a `kid`. You must use the clients/apps API to update the `jwks` or use the new JWKS Management API delete key operation and readd the key with a `kid`.
